attributes.action: Drop all plans for Identity Cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to drop all plans for mandatory identity cards. The privacy and liberty of innocent people shouldn't be restricted in the name of counter terrorism.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this instead:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IDcards/
Please resubmit if you would prefer your own petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
